text: Shangjie railway station () is a railway station of Longhai railway located in Shangjie District, Zhengzhou, Henan, China. The station is currently out of passenger services. == History == The station was opened in 1909. == References == Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Railway stations in Zhengzhou Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1958 Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1909
title: Shangjie railway station
